attributes.action: PLEASE CAN YOU REMOVE THE LONDON MAYOR  FROM HIS POST.
attributes.background: THE LONDON MAYOR  HAS NOT DONE HIS JOB.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about honours or appointments. 

In any case, the Mayor of London is elected by the people of London, not chosen by the UK Government or Parliament.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
